Incorrect vertice FF FF FF FF at 0x50BC8 on L906LEV

Patched to 8884 ( B4 22 00 00 )

Install to HDD/TRILOGY/SECT90 and rename back to L906LEV.MAP

0x51342 == 04 ( double sided transparency fix because the previous change broke the nearby fence panels transparency )

Right side railings double sided transparency fix.

0x51A0E == 04
0x51EBE == 04
0x5236E == 04
0x52AEE == 04

Left side railing double sided transparency fix

0x22BF9 == 04

0x22BF9 == 01 04 ( railing texture fix )
0x50BE8 == 75 00 ( under railing texture fix ) // NOTE : This face still isn't visible
